Oxy Homez - well placed in Ghaziabad city.Prime location at Bhopura Tilla More Road, Ghaziabad,U.P. Oxy Homez - well placed in Ghaziabad city.Prime location at Bhopura Tilla More Road, Ghaziabad,U.P. Advantageous drive time to many of the main streets in Delhi like Canaught Place,Shalimar Garden, Rajendra Nagar and DLF Dilshad Extension. Well connected from Delhi. 4.8 kms from the Dilshad Garden metro station.1.5 kms from proposed metro station.Project entry is on four lane road Transportation facility available from main gate of the Oxy Homez.Easy Proximity to Anand Vihar I.S.B.T and Railway Station.The surrounding area is under massive development - several housing projects by Private builders and Awas Vikas Societies coming up soon.National Institute of Fashion Designing and Technology is setting up their ambitious Campus adjoining the project. Presently a huge number of shopping malls and multiplexes are being constructed in the Ghaziabad city.Flyovers and road widening have improved the traffic congestions. According to the report of 2006, Ghaziabad city has been included among the 10 most dynamic Indian cities around the globe. Nearby Educational Facilities - Famous Schools & College. Various Health care facilities like GTB Hospital and Rajeev Gandhi Multispecialty Hospital A Demanding Location for people living in East Delhi, North Delhi, Ghaziabad, Baraut, Shamli & Merrut.
